idea-plugin.name: Colored Icons
idea-plugin.description: Adds color to many of the gray IntelliJ platform icons. Uses resources from https://github.com/JetBrains/intellij-community and some of the official IntelliJ platform plugins.
idea-plugin.change-notes:
Version 1.4
  • Added tool window icons for Bookmarks, Notifications, Dependencies, Scala, and more
Version 1.3
  • Added new icons related to VCS, unit tests, source code presentation and navigation, and more
  • Recolored import, export, rollback, and module dependencies tool window icons
  • Tweaked hue and brightness of purple icons
Version 1.2
  • Added tool window icons for IDEs - CLion, PyCharm, and Rider
  • Tweaked a few tool window icons
Version 1.1
  • Added tool window icons for Terminal, Pull Requests, Gradle, Ant, Maven
  • Added missing tool window icons from plugins - Java EE, Database Tools, JavaScript
  • Tweaked Build tool window icon
Version 1.0
  • First release with 176 updated icons
